name: Calibrus
overview:
Calibrus, Inc. provides technology based hosted business solutions in the United States. The company offers third party verification (TPV) services, hosted call recording services, and interactive voice response/voice recognition unit (IVR/VRU) services to telecom, cable, and insurance companies. Its TPV service offers live operator and IVR/VRU third party verification services.

The companyâ€™s IVR verification method provides customers with a pre-determined script to comply with each clientâ€™s unique verification requirements. It also provides call recording services, which assist insurance companies to record and retain valuable and mission critical conversations that occur during claim statements and interviews. In addition, the company offers voice message broadcasting solutions, click-to-call services, and call center services. Further, through its Website, SpeechTrack.com, one could record a phone conversation whether at work, home, or on a cell phone.

The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tempe, Arizona.
